title: Mr.Suitcase - Leftovers EP (2006-VBR)
description:
1. Stilnocturnal
2. Christmas Leftovers (Unarmed Enemies starving gourmand mix)
3. Ours Is a Time For Falling In Love (Flow Flux Clan electro coating mix)
4. After Winter&#039;s Rain And Ruin
5. The Road Not Taken (Flow Flux Clan efficient workflow mix)
6. While We&#039;re Learning To Forget (live at Klubb Shaktar, Ãƒâ€“rebro, 2006-05-12)


About the EP from the sleeve:

"In May 2006, my debut EP &#039;The Shame of Being Imperfect&#039; was released. Because of unfortunate delays, the EP had been in production for seven months and during that time, tracks were recorded that didn&#039;t make it to the EP but also wouldn&#039;t fit in on future releases. There&#039;s the brilliant Unarmed Enemies remix that wasn&#039;t included on the EP as the tracklist was already set. There&#039;s the demo versions from madly efficient Flow Flux CLan as they did a couple of different takes before completing the remix of "Ours is a time..." that&#039;s included on the EP. To wrap up this release, I also wanted to put out a live version from our release party gig at Klubb Shaktar in Ãƒâ€“rebro, a wonderful evening with lots of love in the air. Here they are. The leftovers. But even leftovers still hunger. We know that by now, right?     

Mr.Suitcase, Stockholm, July 2006"
